original_text:
Wake up, you drunkards, and weep!
    Wail, all you drinkers of wine;
wail because of the new wine,
    for it has been snatched from your lips.
korean_text: 취하는 자들아 너희는 깨어 울지어다 포도주를 마시는 자들아 너희는 울지어다 이는 단 포도주가 너희 입에서 끊어졌음이니

sentences.original_text: Wail, all you drinkers of wine
sentences.korean_translation: 슬피 울지어다, 포도주를 마시는 너희 모든 자들아

sentences.original_text: wail because of the new wine
for it has been snatched from your lips
